Name: Shoal
About the game: Hungry for shark games? Start fishing! Go fish for food as a hungry shark swimming in a shoal of fish. Take control of a predator hungry shark and hunt for a shoal of fish! Let the fishing begin! Dive into the most relaxing game ever and discover the magic of the deep. Eat fish to keep your energy high, and beware of the big hungry shark out to get you. How do you do it? Go fish...
